title: Billy Vunipola ready to 'fight fire with fire' as he prepares for brutal World Cup final
text:
Billy Vunipola intends to “fight fire with fire” as he prepares to face South Africa in Saturday’s World Cup final in Yokohama knowing that “brutality” is at the heart of the Springbok game.

Vunipola will go head-to-head with one of the talismans of the South Africa side, Duane Vermeulen, at No 8. That battle will set the tone for so much with Vunipola ​acknowledging that big hits in the tackle are “contagious”, and enable a side to build momentum.​

“South Africa have already said they want to fight fire with fire and I guess we return it by saying bring it on,” said Vunipola. “It is a final and it is one of those things you have to front up to. When coaches throw words like ‘brutality’ at you,...
